subject: My Reputation
text:
My reputation I build each day 
I lay a block each time I pray 
It opens doors for me you see 
My reputation's really me 
I'm front and center every day 
When I let Jesus have his way 
The mountains that were there by day 
His precious blood will melt away. My reputation I need it most 
It follows me from coast to coast 
It's in each book of poems I write 
It gives me peace both day and night 
It helps me lay another block 
My reputation is my walk 
So I don't have to fear today 
My reputation's here to stay.
